Pre-Game Insights: The blockbuster match between India and Pakistan will be contested at the famous Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad on Saturday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The BCCI released 14,000 tickets for India's clash with Pakistan at the ODI World Cup on October 14 in Ahmedabad.
Others: The Men In Blue will sport India colours - Blue at ICC Cricket World Cup 2023, according to the BCCI official.
